metadata.inclusion: Press the On/Off button for 5 seconds until you hear one beep. When inclusion completes, you will hear a 'beep' sound with voice message alert and the Connection LED will turn on.
metadata.exclusion: Press the On/Off button for 5 seconds until you hear one beep. When exclusion completes, you will hear a 'beep' sound with voice message alert and the Connection LED will turn off.
metadata.reset: Press the On/Off button for 10 seconds until you hear one beep. When reset completes, you will hear a 'beep' sound with voice message alert.
